Package ss.pentago.tui

Class TextDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.pentago.tui.TextDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientListener
    public class TextDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientListener
    TextDisplay displays events from the Client on System.out.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TextDisplay()
      Creates a new TextDisplay configured to print to System.out.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void boardReceived​(Board board)
      Print the board to System.out using the current BoardSkin.
      void chatReceived​(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String message)
      Simply print the chat message from the sender.
      void errorReceived​(java.lang.String error)
      Print the error to System.out.
      void listReceived​(java.lang.String[] players)
      Invoked when a list of players has been received.
      void messageReceived​(java.lang.String message)
      Simply print the message.
      void moveReceived​(Player player, Move move)
      Display a move to System.out in a human readable format.
      void rankingsReceived​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> rankings)
      Print the top 20 Leaderboard rankings to the screen, as a nicely formatted table.
      void whisperReceived​(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String message)
      Simply print the private chat message from the sender.
